name: Saikogaru
description:
Saikogāru

The game that I finished making on the 22nd of January 2022, Was an idea to create and test some functions on Visual basic for an RPG game. This is the Yandere Simulator, which features a working high score table for those who manage to obtain all the combination segments from the environment around the game map, unlock the door and escape the yandere that is trying to kill them.

The door cannot be unlocked until all the code segments have been found. There are 6 different letters, it does not matter if you collect the same one more than once, the game will check if the different characters are in the combination obtained.
